resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104360</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104360</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206863</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Born in Slavery: Slave Narratives from the Federal Writers' Project, 1936-1938</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Getragen in der Sklaverei: 
Sklavendarstellungen vom BundesProjekt der verfasser, 1936-1938</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Soutenu dans l'esclavage : Récits 
slaves du projet des auteurs fédéraux, 1936-1938</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carregado no slavery: Narrativas slave do 
projeto dos escritores federais, 1936-1938</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sopportato nello slavery: Descrizioni slave 
dal progetto dei produttori federali, 1936-1938</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεννημένος στη σκλαβιά: Αφηγήματα σκλάβων από 
το πρόγραμμα των ομοσπονδιακών συγγραφέων, 1936-1938</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Llevado en esclavitud: Narrativas auxiliares
del proyecto de los programas de escritura federales, 1936-1938</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers 2,300 first-person accounts of slavery and 500 photos of former slaves. The collection can be searched by name, city, state, topic, or other key words. These narratives were collected in the 1930s as part of the Works Progress Administration (WPA).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Angebote 2.300 Erstperson Konten der Sklaverei und
500 Fotos der ehemaligen Sklaven. Die Ansammlung kann namentlich
gesucht werden, Stadt, Zustand, Thema oder andere Schlüsselwörter. 
Diese Darstellungen wurden in den dreißiger Jahren als Teil der
Arbeiten Fortschritt-Leitung (WPA) gesammelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">offres 2.300 comptes de premier-personne 
d'esclavage et 500 photos d'anciens esclaves. La collection peut
être recherchée de nom, ville, état, sujet, ou d'autres mots clés.
Ces récits ont été rassemblés en années 30 en tant 
qu'élément de la gestion d'avancement de travaux (WPA).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ofertas 2.300 clientes da primeiro-pessoa do 
slavery e 500 fotos de escravos anteriores. A coleção pode ser
procurarada pelo nome, pela cidade, pelo estado, pelo tópico, ou por 
outras palavras chaves. Estas narrativas foram coletadas nos 
1930s como parte da administração do progresso de trabalhos (WPA).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">offerte 2.300 clienti della primo-persona di 
slavery e 500 foto degli schiavi precedenti. L'accumulazione 
può essere cercata per nome, città, dichiara, soggetto, o 
altre parole chiave. Queste descrizioni sono state raccolte nei 
1930s come componente della gestione di progresso degli impianti 
(WPA).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσφορές 2.300 απολογισμοί πρώτος-προσώπων της 
σκλαβιάς και 500 φωτογραφίες των προηγούμενων σκλάβων. Η 
συλλογή μπορεί να αναζητηθεί από το όνομα, την πόλη, το κράτος,
το θέμα, ή άλλες βασικές λέξεις. Αυτά τα αφηγήματα 
συλλέχθηκαν στη δεκαετία του '30 ως τμήμα της διοίκησης προόδου 
εργασιών (WPA).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofertas 2.300 cuentas de la primero-persona de la 
esclavitud y 500 fotos de esclavos anteriores. La colección se 
puede buscar por nombre, ciudad, estado, asunto, u otras palabras 
claves. Estas narrativas fueron recogidas en los años 30 como 
parte de la administración del progreso de trabajos (WPA).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206863</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104360</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/born-in-slavery-slave-narratives-from-the-federal-writers-project-1936-1938</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
